title: Joe Biden, Tyrese, Fresh Prince Reunion, Andrew Gillum and more.
itunes:title: Joe Biden, Tyrese, Fresh Prince Reunion, Andrew Gillum and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is singing his damn jam from EWF and it's the B-side. The Chief Love Officer has a reality check for a cheating man with trust issues. Former democratic candidate for governor of Florida Andrew Gillum makes an admission. Ray J files for divorce. Joe Biden spoke in his hometown yesterday about climate change and how it affects us all. Tyrese opens up about his insecurities growing up. Junior talks about the NFL playing the Black National Anthem before games. Steve and Tommy talk fishing and different types of fish. We will be getting a Fresh Prince of Bel-Air Reunion! Today in Closing Remarks, Steve tells it like it is, "It's Go Time!" He also reminds us why it is important to honor our forefathers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
